title: League of Legends Valentine's Day Cards
body:
Hello All!

I'll be creating some e-cards that you can send to lock down that Valentine this year!  Enjoy!

follow me on http://www.twitter.com/mordekaiser_lol for more and be sure to check out http://www.rizeupgaming.com and http://www.goodgamewellplayed.org

**Update**

Added some special cards for you ranked queue lovers!

Bronze:  http://rizeupgaming.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/bronzeduo.gif

Silver:  http://rizeupgaming.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/silverduo.gif

Gold:  http://rizeupgaming.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/goldduo.gif

Plat:  http://rizeupgaming.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/platduo.gif

Diamond:  http://rizeupgaming.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/diamond.gif

Challenger:  http://rizeupgaming.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/02/challengerduo.gif

You Had Me At GLHF: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BfEittOCQAAWjYP.jpg

I Would Face Check For You: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BfEjGiCCEAEkq6a.jpg

I Love To Play All Positions: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BfEjLYbCYAAX-vM.jpg

You're My Favorite Creep Score Stealer: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BfEi8fCCMAAag-8.jpg

Misery Loves Company, We Should Hang Out: https://pbs.twimg.com/media/BfJ5Ym1CUAE8Huh.png

replies.body: Love this... card already sent for an early Valentine's Day!
It would be cool to see some more, maybe some with the champs on them too!
The vision and ward reference just made my day.
Valentine's Day is coming!  Bumping for great justice.
ugh, i dont get why everyone gets so mushy at valentines, its just a way for companys to make stacks o money
